about_the_game:
Get ready for new type of rhythm action game you may have never experienced before. Listen to various music, dodge various types of obstacles, and successfully finish playing each music to go on to the next level. Be warned, though, the more progress you make, the harder (and even impossible by the looks!) the level becomes for you to finish. (Note: This is a demo version of the game, and so will not contain certain features that are going to be included in the actual release of the game)

How This Game Works

In each level, you will see a big circle and a small ball circling around the circle. Your main task here is to control the ball (i.e., put it either outside or inside the big circle) to dodge all the obstacles it encounters along the way and successfully finish the level. Each level is accompanied with certain background music, and it will be a lot helpful you listen to the music while playing the game since all the obstacles are positioned according to specific beats of the music.

But note that it won't be that simple; the game will do everything it can to prevent you from finishing each level. Most of the time, you will be required to "focus" on the beats and the obstacles no matter what the game does to you, such as changing the size of the circle, the position and/or speed of the ball, changing colors, and even showing off fake obstacles! Try to get through all those unfair gimmicks and eventually finish all the levels prepared just for you.

Features

The game contains various minor features for you to fully enjoy it, including:

  • Basic tutorial
  • Key binding personalization
  • Sync adjustment
  • 3 selectable difficulties (easy, normal, hard) prepared for each music
  • 5 different music

Credits

The original version of the game was created and released by IMING via Flash in 2014. The developer of this game, GJ, sincerely thanks IMING for coming up with the idea of the original game and also for allowing the developer to create OOBEX based on the game.
